Key Match Events: Harry Wilson scored the only goal of the game from a penalty kick
Post-Match Reflections: Craig Bellamy extended his unbeaten start as Wales' new manager
Miscellaneous Highlights: Harry Wilson is the first Welshman to score in three successive games for his country since Gareth Bale at Euro 2016
Others: Montenegro is bottom without a point in Group B4
Wales is second in Group B4 with eight points after four matches
Top spot in the group will be on the line when Wales travels to Turkey on Nov. 16
